title: Romulus and Hersilia, or, The Sabine war a trage dy acted at the Dukes Theatre.
author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
publisher: Printed for D. Brown ... and T. Benskin ...
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Epilogue written by Mrs. A. Behn.
Not to be confused with the play of this title written by Ralph Schomberg.
